scenes.description: Music video snippet for 'Entropy (Acoustic Arrange Ver.)' with album details on screen.
Promotional medley for the album 'Route If' featuring the song 'Lazy'. Various campaign details are displayed.
Music video snippet for 'Entropy' showing ticket information and live performance details.

subtitles.original: 速度が
subtitles.english: The speed

subtitles.original: 息急いで走った分だけ
subtitles.english: Just as much as I ran out of breath

subtitles.original: 寿命だって早く来ちゃったりして
subtitles.english: My life might even come to an end sooner

subtitles.original: 息切れして声も出ないの
subtitles.english: Out of breath, I can't even speak

subtitles.original: タイムパフォーマンス コスパパフォーマンス
subtitles.english: Time performance, cost performance

subtitles.original: 言葉 踊り狂う僕らって万能ね
subtitles.english: Words, we're all-powerful as we dance wildly

subtitles.original: 毎日焼かれてやり直しよ
subtitles.english: Every day we're burned and start over

subtitles.original: ランチタイムくらい まったりさせて
subtitles.english: At least let me relax during lunchtime

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow wow... 跡も欲しくない
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow... I don't even want a trace

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow wow... さあさ掘り込め
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow... Come on, dig in

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow wow... 口の中が溶けてゆく
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow... My mouth is melting

subtitles.original: あれここはどこ 私は誰だっけ
subtitles.english: Wait, where is this? Who was I again?

subtitles.original: 拝啓 石の上にも三年もいられない者たち
subtitles.english: To those who can't stay on a stone for three years

subtitles.original: 任せたっていい やめたっていい
subtitles.english: It's okay to leave it, it's okay to quit

subtitles.original: 量販店還元大バーゲン
subtitles.english: Mass retailer return giant bargain

subtitles.original: 的外れでオートだね
subtitles.english: Missing the mark, it's automatic

subtitles.original: 感情の足音ペース
subtitles.english: The pace of emotion's footsteps

subtitles.original: 頑張るって無駄なベース
subtitles.english: Doing your best is a useless base

subtitles.original: 半信半疑 四季折々 風情もりもり
subtitles.english: Half-convinced, season by season, full of elegance

subtitles.original: 流れるのを緩やかに愛でて
subtitles.english: Gently appreciate what flows

subtitles.original: 味わって急がば回れ
subtitles.english: Taste it, and make haste slowly

subtitles.original: 知ってるはずが焦り耳を凝らして
subtitles.english: I should know, but in my impatience, I strain my ears

subtitles.original: どうになっちゃって あららになっちゃって
subtitles.english: What's happened, oh my

subtitles.original: ママを忘る心が
subtitles.english: The heart that forgets its mother

subtitles.original: 削ぎ落として絞った分だけ
subtitles.english: Just as much as I've shaved off and squeezed out

subtitles.original: 痩せ細って弱くなっちゃったりして
subtitles.english: I might even become thin and weak

subtitles.original: 息を吸って声を出して
subtitles.english: Take a breath and speak up

subtitles.original: あれもしたい これもしたい そんな欲望抱くだけで死ぬ人生
subtitles.english: I want to do that, I want to do this, a life that ends just harboring such desires

subtitles.original: I'm sorry 開いて大人になっちゃって
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, opening up and becoming an adult

subtitles.original: 腹八分目なんて真っ平ら 真っ平ら ごめんなさい
subtitles.english: Being eighty percent full is absolutely flat, I'm sorry

subtitles.english: Time performance, cost performance

subtitles.english: At least let me relax during lunchtime

subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow... I don't even want a trace

subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow... Come on, dig in

subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow... My mouth is melting

subtitles.original: あれここはどこ 私は誰だっけ
subtitles.english: Wait, where is this? Who was I again?

subtitles.original: 捕まえた
subtitles.english: I caught you

subtitles.original: でも逃げた
subtitles.english: But you ran away

subtitles.original: 繰り返す本能には
subtitles.english: In the repeating instinct

subtitles.original: 諦める
subtitles.english: I give up

subtitles.original: 術はない
subtitles.english: There is no way

subtitles.original: 無理にさえも手を伸ばすだけ
subtitles.english: I only reach out even if it's impossible

subtitles.original: だから強く
subtitles.english: So, strongly

subtitles.original: 見つめ合えば
subtitles.english: If we gaze at each other

subtitles.original: 今を生き抜く石屑
subtitles.english: Stone fragments to survive the present

subtitles.original: 描き添えて
subtitles.english: Draw and add to it

subtitles.original: 色のない未来を裂けた
subtitles.english: Tearing through the colorless future

subtitles.original: 今は分岐は無限でも
subtitles.english: Even if the branches are infinite now

subtitles.original: 君と交差したい時の果て
subtitles.english: The end of time where I want to cross paths with you

subtitles.original: 期待値が高すぎたって
subtitles.english: Even if expectations were too high

subtitles.original: そこに追いついて鋭い感情を指した
subtitles.english: I catch up there and point out sharp emotions

subtitles.original: 今は詰まりは何だって
subtitles.english: Now, what is the blockage?

subtitles.original: 嘘は負ける星が合致してしまう
subtitles.english: Lies lose, the stars end up matching

subtitles.original: 綺麗な偽りを見抜いて
subtitles.english: See through the beautiful lies

subtitles.original: 心のまま Chaotic world
subtitles.english: As your heart desires, Chaotic world

subtitles.original: 紐解いた
subtitles.english: I unraveled it

subtitles.original: また増えた
subtitles.english: It increased again

subtitles.original: 名残惜しくない運命なら
subtitles.english: If it's a fate I don't miss

subtitles.original: 振り返る
subtitles.english: I look back

subtitles.original: 暇はない
subtitles.english: There is no time

subtitles.original: 闇よりも早い選択
subtitles.english: Choices faster than darkness

subtitles.original: 誰を満たす
subtitles.english: Who to satisfy

subtitles.original: 誰かよりも
subtitles.english: More than anyone

subtitles.original: まずは胸の中凝視
subtitles.english: First, gaze into your chest

subtitles.original: 狂い合いに
subtitles.english: In the mutual madness

subtitles.original: 星はただ輝きをまっすぐに届ける
subtitles.english: The stars just deliver their brilliance straight ahead

subtitles.original: 今は全部は知らないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know everything now, but

subtitles.original: 君と共有した甘い鼓動
subtitles.english: The sweet heartbeat I shared with you

subtitles.original: 揺らいでる天体の前で
subtitles.english: Before the wavering celestial bodies

subtitles.original: 消えないように灯火をさえ 重い重いけど
subtitles.english: So they don't go out, even the lanterns are heavy

subtitles.original: 今はいつの間にかでも
subtitles.english: Even if it's sometime now

subtitles.original: 嘘に染まるなんて無理だから
subtitles.english: Because it's impossible to be stained by lies

subtitles.original: 正論と笑われる まだ誇りになら Chaotic world
subtitles.english: Laughed at as the correct argument, still pride, Chaotic world
